trends: There have been no other sightings in Willemstad
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: it went up then down then up again to the left to the right and went away very very fast.
divs: Sighting Detailswe where eating outside and then my dad sayd : WOW! look at that! we all stood up and we have seen a round shaped fireball object going up,down,up,left,right. I ran to get my telescope .... but it was too late. the light was dimming and it was gone. I first taught it was a U.F.O. I was scarred and amazed too.
